author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

Follow-up of #28334 and #27832. This PR switches to using GEM clusters instead of GEM pads in the GEM-CSC local trigger. For now I'm keeping the option to run directly on GEM pads in the code because it may be useful in the optimization of the cluster selection.

#### PR validation:

I ran matrix test 22034.0. I also tested the efficiency in high pileup simulations (PU200). LCT efficiency shows <1% drop in efficiency due to overflow of the GEM cluster collection.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

N/A

@tahuang1991
title: Use GEM clusters in the GEM-CSC local trigger
